Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad clue-collection without a hypothesis, introducing the analysis.
Listing man-made object details descriptively, still no specific hypothesis.
Listing natural elements broadly, continued clue collection.
Descriptive cultural and language clues collection, no convergence yet.

Depth-First.Explanation: Generating a specific hypothesis based on key street-name clues and planning verification.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Intersection of Koreastraße and Hongkongstraße in Germany

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirming the hypothesis by naming the precise location.

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to hypothesis generation using the street-name intersection clue.
